attributes.action: Downgrade child car seat and belt laws to advice and recommendations only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These laws are a nightmare for parents and grand-parents particularly with more than one child to cope with and could even be counter-productive.  How many toddlers will be hurt running into the road whilst a howling, wriggling baby is being strapped in  and bored older children are very distracting to the driver.

Anyone with a back problem finds the operation impossible.

More than 2 children creates disproportionate extra space, cost and hassle problems and could exaccerbate the demographic time bomb.

The rigidity of 'law' takes a lot of the spontaneity out of life
